mapper.insert: insert into app_store_table (appstoreid, appstorename, appstoreversion, company, url, schema, apppushintf, appdtransid, addedtime, modifiedtime, description) values (#{appStoreId}, #{appStoreName}, #{appStoreVersion}, #{company}, #{url}, #{schema}, #{appPushIntf}, #{appdTransId}, (select now()), (select now()), #{description})
mapper.select: select appstoreid, appstorename, appstoreversion, company, url, schema, apppushintf, apptransid, addedtime, modifiedtime, description from app_store_table where appstoreid = #{appStoreId}
